products.title: Verdi (Blackout), Smoke Embers - Roller Blind
products.description: As you wonder what to do with your decor you notice something out of the corner of your eye; it's the fabric we call smoke embers from their new verdi (blackout) range. products.title: Verdi (Blackout), Sahara Sand - Roller Blind

products.title: Verdi (Blackout), Pearl River - Roller Blind
